verses.roman:
kṛpā kari' teṅho mora nilaye āilā
more śisya kari' mora hāte 'bhikṣā' kailā

synonyms: kṛpā kari'—by his causeless mercy; teṅho—he; mora nilaye—to my humble place; āilā—came; more—me; śisya kari'-accepting as his disciple; mora hāte—from my hand; bhikṣā kailā—accepted lunch.
translation: "While at Mathurā, Śrīpāda Mādhavendra Purī visited my house and accepted me as a disciple. He even took lunch at my home.
